name: Time Wizard (yourgeekeric)
description:
Short simple platformer game with 5 levels. It ended up too short but I'll do better next time!

xbox controller or Keyboard

move = {left stick} {a,d} 

Jump = {A Button} {space or j}

Set Time Point = {X Button} {k}

Rewind To Point = {B Button} {L}

I will make a devlog on my channel YourGeekEric 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLSRNQfx5LV4GLqTbTnE8uw
